website_summaries.verdict: Provides best mix of style, comfort, and being able to control the soccer ball.
pros: Uses a combination of leather and mesh fabrics to deliver breathability and foot support
Stands out for the nicely placed studs on the bottom to deliver traction and balance
Horizontal ridges on shoe give precise touch on the ball
cons: Very expensive pair of soccer shoes, but they will last

customer_reviews.title: Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine from Western Sporting Goods. Sold me the lower tier cleat, Mercurial Victory XI, and tried to sell it at the price of the Mercurial Vapor XI. The lower tier cleat has a plastic, low quality traction, note the studs are solid and not translucent. Additionally, it doesn't have the ACC label. Returning, that was at least a one hundred dollar price difference for the product received. Comparative photos displayed.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: He wore these for a few months before telling me he didn't like them, and wanted to go back to Hypervenoms
customer_reviews.text: These were for my high school aged son playing as a striker. He wore these for a few months before telling me he didn't like them, and wanted to go back to Hypervenoms. Instead, he ended up with Tiempo Legends, which he loves. Mercurials just aren't for everybody, I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Bothwell

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shoe. Worn by my son who plays year ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe. Worn by my son who plays year round competitive youth soccer. Good for strikers or anyone who needs that extra speed and touch sensitivity. Nike always seems to mess with the design of the Vapor. I'd suggest they stop and keep this the way it is in the XI.
customer_reviews.author: mckelvis

customer_reviews.title: Read
customer_reviews.text: Super curious as to why they didn't come in the Nike box with the Nike bag. I hope they're not replica shoes Used them last night 8/9/2017 for the first time felt good. This is my fourth pair and I noticed the stud under the balls of my feet was a bit different. But didn't bother me at all. Hopefully that doesn't change after a few more games
customer_reviews.author: jonathan campbell

customer_reviews.title: Shoe runs slightly smaller.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this shoe because it was the same manufacturer (and almost the same shoe) as my daughters previous pair of cleats. Reason we did not purchase the same exact same one is because Kangaroo leather is no longer sold in California. However, this shoe came slightly smaller than the previous one, which was a big problem. Only used it for one game, but don't know what to do with them now.
customer_reviews.author: Paul James

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them and they are very comfortable. Better then the ones with socks
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them and they are very comfortable. Better then the ones with socks. Actually those are even more expensive and not worth
customer_reviews.author: mahana

customer_reviews.title: nike all the way
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this shoe to play soccer. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Jieselle Mc Collin

customer_reviews.title: Great material and size
customer_reviews.text: These are the best cleats. Very comfortable and are the best for both I foot and outdoor soccer. My boyfriend loved wearing these for his tournaments and I can’t wait to get more from this company
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: For a synthetic shoe, it has almost no breaking ...
customer_reviews.text: For a synthetic shoe, it has almost no breaking in period. But that could also be because it's not my first mercurial vapor so I'm used to the fit.
customer_reviews.author: zaid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son of 12 years of age loves this cleat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got this being a bit scared of what was to come but the cleats came in right size and everything, really really happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: PLDS

customer_reviews.text: I Love this cleats (football, Soccer) cleats I didn't expect that away those are serving.

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats with a whole new design
customer_reviews.text: Great cleats with a whole new design. If you're used to a specific size to fit snug, I recommend getting a size down because these fit a little bigger than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Orellana

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow but after breaking them in they fit great..
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow in the toe area! Blisters for awhile. Not worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Janis e kimata

customer_reviews.title: Best cleats
customer_reviews.text: Best soccer cleats I've even bought, and the price was unbeatable.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are really light and they didn't take long to get broken in.

product_meta.title: Nike Mercurial Vapor XI CR7 FG Mens Soccer-Shoes 852514
product_meta.description: Embossed horizontal ridges increase ball awareness and control. Lightweight compressed nylon plate is contoured to mirror the foot's shape. Updated stud configuration was developed using computer modeling to achieve the ideal balance of traction, torque and comfort. Tongueless construction wraps the foot for a snug, locked-down fit. Low-profile toe box helps you get under the ball. All Conditions Control (ACC) technology provides optimal ball control in both wet and dry conditions. Anti-skid top cloth grips the foot to increase traction inside the boot.
